TopicTitle: What are some good addons for my purposes?

Articles.Content: Hello everyone, second post here, so sorry if I mess up on something! I was wondering, what are some good addons for 1.0 or 1.0.2 that are realistic, and simulate the real space program to an extent? For instance, they add Apollo Craft, or Gemini craft, or even more than that, just realistic rockets such as the Titan, Ariane and Saturn. Thank you very much! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
First answer for this question is usually [FASA](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24867-1-0-2-FASA-May10th-1-0-2-Release-v5-34). But, I'm sure there are also others.

Have you seen FASA ? [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24867-FASA-Jul-21-24-Release-v4-97](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24867-FASA-Jul-21-24-Release-v4-97)

EDIT- O ninja ninja ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Wow, I will search for others, but for now, this one looks amazing! So accurate, this is exactly what I was looking for! One question, though! Does it replace anything in the game, or is it just adding on? Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
